description: Identifier of the application user or service whose session ended (logoff event).
System-generated unique ID of the terminated session, used to correlate with login/activity logs.
Date and timestamp when the logoff event was recorded in the system (server time or UTC; confirm).
Likely the account, job, or application component that created this log entry; confirm with SME.
Optional free-text notes about the logoff, such as reason, errors, or contextual details.
